name: Pendulis [Preview]
description:
The first few sections of Pendulis.

Note: If you find the screen shake uncomfortable, it can be toned down, or even removed, from the settings section on the main menu.

Controls: 

Jump:  A button / Space or Z key

Grapple (hold): Right Trigger / Shift

Grapple(toggle): X button / X key

Interact: B button / Alt key

Map: Back button  / M key

Look: Around: Y button / L key
